<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 10"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Imposing Destrier](/Feats.aspx?ID=238) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Champion" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=24" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 113 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Prerequisites**
[divine ally (steed)](/Classes.aspx?ID=4); [Loyal Warhorse](/Feats.aspx?ID=228)

</column>

---

Under your care, your mount has realized its innate potential. The mount you gained through the divine ally class feature is now a [nimble or savage animal companion](/companions/animal-companions/advanced-options). During an encounter, even if you don't use the [Command an Animal](/Actions.aspx?ID=58) action, your mount can still use 1 action on your turn to Stride or Strike.

<title level="2">Imposing Destrier leads to...</title>
[Auspicious Mount](/Feats.aspx?ID=256)
name: Imposing Destrier
